coreSkills.title: Ethical Hacking
coreSkills.description: Conducting authorized simulated cyberattacks on computer systems to identify and fix security vulnerabilities before malicious actors can exploit them.

coreSkills.title: Network Security
coreSkills.description: Implementing policies and controls to protect network infrastructure, including firewalls, IDS/IPS, VPNs, and secure network architecture design.

coreSkills.title: Encryption
coreSkills.description: Expertise in cryptographic protocols, key management, and implementing encryption solutions to protect sensitive data both at rest and in transit.

coreSkills.title: Vulnerability Assessment
coreSkills.description: Systematically identifying, classifying, and prioritizing vulnerabilities in systems, applications, and network infrastructure.

coreSkills.title: Cloud Security
coreSkills.description: Securing cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP) through proper configuration, monitoring, access controls, and compliance with security best practices.

coreSkills.title: Secure Coding
coreSkills.description: Application security testing, code reviews, and implementing secure coding practices to prevent common vulnerabilities like XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection.
